name: SHMUP 2142
description:
NOTE: This is currently a prototype version created in 3-4 days and is only available for download for Windows (for now).

SHMUP 2142 is a side-scrolling shoot em up set in space. Fly your ship and shoot any hostiles in your way!
The game includes 1 level, a handful of powerups, enemies and 1 boss fight.

CONTROLS (KEYBOARD ONLY)
Move: WASD/ Arrow Keys
Shoot: Spacebar
Navigate Menus: LMB
Pause: Escape

Any comments and feedback is appreciated, and thanks for playing!
